import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import '../App.css' import { BsFillCloudLightningRainFill } from 'react-icons/bs' const Weather = () => { const baseURL = "https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather" const APIKey = "bc9ace9cbb93f58311fd175226590e36" const getWeatherData = async () => { await axios.get(`${baseURL}?appid=${APIKey}&q=Pretoria`) .then((response) => { console.log(response); }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }) } useEffect(() => { getWeatherData() }, []) return (
Pretoria | South Africa

Humidity: 75%
) } export default Weather
